column4: Hello, I'm on Ubuntu 10.4 and wanting to upgrade to 11.4 as I just read it was released. However, it's not listed in the update manager after refreshing. (I have it set to normal releases) Only 10.10 is shown. Am I missing something?
You have to upgrade to 10.10 before you can upgrade to 11.04
You can from LTS to LTS, but 11.04 is a normal release and not an LTS
6.06, 8.04, 10.04 were LTS, about every 2 years between LTS versions
